authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

siteId.name: siteId
siteId.description: ID of the site containing the collection whose items to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
siteId.ai_hint: ID of the site containing the collection whose items to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

collectionId.name: collectionId
collectionId.description: ID of the collection whose items to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
collectionId.ai_hint: ID of the collection whose items to retrieve. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

live.name: live
live.description: Whether the item should be published on the live site

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi

values.name: fieldId
values.description: Field to set for the item to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Value to set for the item to update

fieldsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

itemId.name: itemId
itemId.description: ID of the item to update
itemId.ai_hint: ID of the item to update

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'siteId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'live'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'siteId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'siteId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'live'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'siteId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'collectionId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
